function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in energy efficiency may lead to changes in building automation and control systems, affecting the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Unplanned changes in building systems may lead to a higher risk of disease propagation if not managed effectively.","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough risk assessment and testing of building automation and control systems to ensure that changes do not compromise disease mitigation measures.","Technologies":"Building automation and control system (BACS) integration with disease mitigation measures, advanced sensors for monitoring air quality and disease transmission.","People":"Occupants, facility managers, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Facility management staff, building automation specialists."}]}
